mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.code, a.name AS "name", a.del_flag AS "delFlag", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.reference_flag AS "referenceFlag", a.owner AS "owner", a.upload_date as "uploadDate"
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO bj_organ( id, code,name, del_flag, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, remarks, reference_flag, upload_date, owner ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{code},#{name}, #{delFlag}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{remarks}, #{referenceFlag}, #{uploadDate}, #{owner} )
mapper.update: UPDATE bj_organ SET code=#{code}, name = #{name}, update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate}, remarks = #{remarks}, reference_flag = #{referenceFlag}, upload_date = #{uploadDate}, owner = #{owner} WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.select:

FROM bj_organ a
a.del_flag = #{DEL_FLAG_NORMAL} and (a.upload_date is null or a.upload_date < a.update_date )
limit 100
